page.title: 15TOT HILL GARAGE
page.content: Tot Hill Garage is situated on the A45,which is near to the Chilton Hall estate.The 30 year old garage is run by a staff of 20.The garage site covers 2 acres.This will be very useful to the new restaurant that is planned to replace the garage in a few years time. The garage now sells;oil,newspapers, cigarettes,petrol,sweets,groceries, snacks,icecreams and cars.On average they service about 20 cars a week and actually sell 7 cars.As the garage is on the A45 it is always busy.The diesel pump and 3 petrol pumps are very productive and have to supply enough fuel for the 2-3 hundred cars and lorries they have to fill each day,totalling 15000 gallons of petrol a week.
